text: Petr Vopěnka (16 May 1935 – 20 March 2015) was a Czech mathematician. In the early 1970s, he established the alternative set theory. Since the mid-eighties he concerned himself with philosophical questions of mathematics. ==Works by Petr Vopěnka== * * * * * ==Other websites== * Short biography in English * Documentary about Vopěnka (in Czech with English subtitles, freely downloadable) Category:1935 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Czech philosophers Category:Czech mathematicians Category:Scientists from Prague
title: Petr Vopěnka
